Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 81st overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Earned first career win on 5/15/2015...
Had first career hit on 8/30/2015, off Jeffrey Ash (PHI)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,992,857 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,992,857 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/19/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $12,600,000 per year...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Traded from Houston to New York on 2/25/2020 (Going to HOU: P Charles Barney, 3B Manuel Santoro. Going to NY: P Luis Cabello, SS Joseph Defoor, P Abel Blanco)...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 6/20/2020 (Going to CHI: 2B Robert Serrano, LF Mark Starr, P Luis Cabello, P Lesley Simoneau, 1B Andres Armendariz. Going to NY: 2B John James, RF Kevin McGuire)
...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/2/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $3,333,333 per year...
Injured on 8/28/2022 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
